Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class MatchServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.MatchServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RmiServerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class MatchServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RmiServerInterface
This class represents the server that manages a game
See Also:

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(List<Position> pos, int col, String nickname) throws RemoteException, InvalidNicknameException, InvalidMoveException, GameEndedException
      This method lets the current player make a move
      Specified by:
      makeMove in interface RmiServerInterface
      Parameters:
      pos - : list of tile positions
      col - : column
      nickname - : nickname of the player making the move
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
      InvalidNicknameException - if the nickname is invalid
      InvalidMoveException - if the move is invalid
      GameEndedException - if the game is ended
